name: crystal
description: Crystal - Claude Code Commander for managing multiple Claude Code instances

scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "pnpm run --filter frontend dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4521 && electron ."
scripts.electron-dev:custom: concurrently "pnpm run --filter frontend dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4521 && electron ."
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run build:electron
scripts.build:mac: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.build:mac:universal: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --universal --publish never
scripts.build:mac:x64: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --x64 --publish never
scripts.build:mac:arm64: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --publish never
scripts.build:linux: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.build:linux:ci: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.build:mac:ci: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.build:win: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.build:win:x64: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.release:mac: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --publish always
scripts.release:mac:universal: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --universal --publish always
scripts.release:linux: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && electron-builder --linux --publish always
scripts.canary:mac: node scripts/prepare-canary.js && CANARY_BUILD=true pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && node scripts/configure-build.js && electron-builder --mac --publish always --config.releaseInfo.releaseNotes="Canary build from main branch"
scripts.canary:linux: node scripts/prepare-canary.js && CANARY_BUILD=true pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:main && pnpm run inject-build-info && pnpm run generate-notices && electron-builder --linux --publish always --config.releaseInfo.releaseNotes="Canary build from main branch"
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run electron:rebuild && pnpm run build:main

entry.Name: Crystal
entry.Comment: Claude Code Commander for managing multiple Claude Code instances
